meanings.definition: The ability of certain organisms to produce their own food using inorganic compounds as a source of energy.
meanings.sent1: Chemoautotrophy helps some organisms make their own food.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study chemoautotrophy in unique organisms.
meanings.sent3: The chemoautotrophy of bacteria can be quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: In nature, chemoautotrophy is like a self-sustaining factory.
meanings.sent5: The concept of chemoautotrophy is fascinating to learn about.

meanings.definition: The process by which certain bacteria obtain energy by oxidizing inorganic substances.
meanings.sent1: Bacteria rely on chemoautotrophy to get energy.
meanings.sent2: Chemoautotrophy is crucial for some bacteria's survival.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a tiny bacteria party powered by chemoautotrophy!
meanings.sent4: The world of bacteria is full of chemoautotrophy adventures.
meanings.sent5: Chemoautotrophy in bacteria is like a supercharged battery.
